title: Ultimate Marvel vs. Capcom 3 (UMvC3) Tier List
description: Discover the Ultimate Marvel vs. Capcom 3 (UMvC3) tier list with detailed descriptions of the best characters ranked from S Tier to C Tier. Find out which characters dominate the game and why they stand out.
heading: Ultimate Marvel vs. Capcom 3 (UMvC3) Tier List
introText: Discover the Ultimate Marvel vs. Capcom 3 (UMvC3) tier list with detailed descriptions of the best characters ranked from S Tier to C Tier. Find out which characters dominate the game and why they stand out.

data.itemDescription: High damage output, excellent mix-ups, and strong hyper combos
